name: EbookGov-Demo-AZ
description: AI Booking Agent for Rural Arizona Properties Demo - EbookGov
firstMessage: Hi, this is Emma from EbookGov. I need to let you know upfront that I'm an AI assistant. I'm here to help you explore our rural Arizona properties and book showings. Are you interested in checking out a specific property, or would you like me to tell you what we have available?

functions.name: bookShowing
functions.description: Book a property showing appointment for a caller. Call this when the caller wants to schedule a viewing and has provided their name, phone, property preference, and preferred date/time.

propertyId.description: The property ID (e.g., AZ-FLAG-001, AZ-FLAG-002, AZ-COC-001, AZ-NAV-001, AZ-YAV-001)

propertyName.description: Full property name for confirmation (e.g., Mountain View Ranch)

callerName.description: Name of person requesting the showing

preferredDate.description: Preferred date (e.g., Friday, tomorrow, next week, January 20th)

functions.name: transferToHuman
functions.description: Transfer the call to a human agent. Call this ONLY when the caller explicitly requests to speak with a human, OR when they show strong interest in the EbookGov service and say yes to discussing pricing.

callerName.description: Name of the caller being transferred

callerPhone.description: Phone number of caller for callback if transfer fails

reason.description: Reason for transfer (e.g., 'Wants to discuss pricing', 'Requested human agent', 'Interested in EbookGov service')

demoCompleted.description: True if the caller completed a booking demo before requesting transfer

functions.name: getPropertyDetails
functions.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific property. Call this when the caller asks for more details about a property.

propertyId.description: The property ID to look up (e.g., AZ-FLAG-001) or a location/name search term
